description: [SILENTTRINITY](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0692) contains a number of modules that can bypass UAC, including through Window's Device Manager, Manage Optional Features, and an image hijack on the `.msc` file extension.(Citation: GitHub SILENTTRINITY Modules July 2019)

external_references.description: Salvati, M. (2019, August 6). SILENTTRINITY Modules. Retrieved March 24, 2022.
